customItemStyles.description:
Set to true for more control over the item styles. Only modifies styles
when used with customRenderItem.
customItemStyles.name: customItemStyles

customRenderItem.name: customRenderItem

customRenderSection.name: customRenderSection

customSectionStyles.description:
Set to true for more control over the section heading styles. Only modifies styles
when used with customRenderItem.
customSectionStyles.name: customSectionStyles

defaultSectionHeader.description: A default section header value for items that do not have a section.
defaultSectionHeader.name: defaultSectionHeader

labelledBy.description: An ID of an element that provides the labelling for this list.
labelledBy.name: labelledBy
